variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: type
variable.value: Mixed dementia: Alzheimer's Disease and Vascular Dementia
Vascular Dementia with no Alzheimer's Disease
neither Alzheimer's Disease nor Vascular Dementia

variable.name: entry_date
variable.description: Date of entry into the "Demential Mild Plus Incidence" cohort

variable.name: last_cogint_date
variable.description: Last date known to be cognitively intact

variable.name: survdate
variable.description: Date of incident dementia, death, or censoring
